languages.text: "Господа офицеры! Вам оказана честь — лично Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус проведет сегодняшнее собрание. Лорд-капитан всемилостивейше готов{mf||а} выслушать ваши доклады".
"Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."
languages.original_text: "Господа офицеры! Вам оказана честь — лично Лорд-капитан {name} фон Валанциус проведет сегодняшнее собрание. Лорд-капитан всемилостивейше готов{mf||а} выслушать ваши доклады".

traits.locale_text: "Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."
"Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."
"Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."
"Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."

languages.text: “军官们，请注意！你们被授予了殊荣！领主舰长{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人将亲自主持今天的简报会。我们最为平易近人的舰长大人已经准备好听取你们的报告了。”
languages.original_text: "Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."

traits.locale_text: “军官们，请注意！你们被授予了殊荣！领主舰长{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯大人将亲自主持今天的简报会。我们最为平易近人的舰长大人已经准备好听取你们的报告了。”

languages.text: 「士官諸君！我らが誉れあるロード・キャプテン、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様が自ら本日のブリーフィングを行う。我が最も慈悲深いロード・キャプテンが、諸君の報告を聞く用意ができている」
languages.original_text: "Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."

traits.locale_text: 「士官諸君！我らが誉れあるロード・キャプテン、{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウス様が自ら本日のブリーフィングを行う。我が最も慈悲深いロード・キャプテンが、諸君の報告を聞く用意ができている」

languages.text: "Achtung, Offiziere! Euch wird eine große Ehre zuteil – Lord Captain {name} von Valancius wird das heutige Briefing selbst leiten. Unser hochgeschätzter Lord Captain ist bereit, Eure Berichte zu hören."
languages.original_text: "Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."

traits.locale_text: "Achtung, Offiziere! Euch wird eine große Ehre zuteil – Lord Captain {name} von Valancius wird das heutige Briefing selbst leiten. Unser hochgeschätzter Lord Captain ist bereit, Eure Berichte zu hören."

languages.text: « Officiers, votre attention ! Un véritable privilège vous est accordé : {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} {name} von Valancius présidera en personne la réunion d'aujourd'hui. Notre {mf|gracieux maître est prêt|gracieuse maîtresse est prête} à écouter vos rapports. »
languages.original_text: "Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."

traits.locale_text: « Officiers, votre attention ! Un véritable privilège vous est accordé : {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} {name} von Valancius présidera en personne la réunion d'aujourd'hui. Notre {mf|gracieux maître est prêt|gracieuse maîtresse est prête} à écouter vos rapports. »

languages.text: «¡Atención, oficiales! Hoy han sido agraciados con un gran honor: {mf|el |la} Lord Capitán {name} von Valancius presidirá personalmente la sesión informativa de hoy. Nuestr{mf|o|a} magnánim{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán está list{mf|o|a} para escuchar sus informes».
languages.original_text: "Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."

traits.locale_text: «¡Atención, oficiales! Hoy han sido agraciados con un gran honor: {mf|el |la} Lord Capitán {name} von Valancius presidirá personalmente la sesión informativa de hoy. Nuestr{mf|o|a} magnánim{mf|o|a} Lord Capitán está list{mf|o|a} para escuchar sus informes».

languages.text: "Subaylar, dikkat! Bugün bir şerefe nail olacaksınız. Lord Kaptan {name} von Valancius bugünkü toplantıyı bizzat yönetecek. Pek lütufkâr Lord Kaptanımız, raporlarınızı dinlemeye hazırdır."
languages.original_text: "Attention, officers! You have been granted an honour — Lord Captain {name} von Valancius will personally conduct today's briefing. Our most gracious Lord Captain is ready to hear your reports."

traits.locale_text: "Subaylar, dikkat! Bugün bir şerefe nail olacaksınız. Lord Kaptan {name} von Valancius bugünkü toplantıyı bizzat yönetecek. Pek lütufkâr Lord Kaptanımız, raporlarınızı dinlemeye hazırdır."
